name: Suho
dialog: (Checking or watering the gratitude tree) Grow, grow, tree!

name: 주인공
dialog: Suhoh master, I'm here. Hope!

name: Suho
dialog: Ding dong! P_name! Come on in.

name: 주인공
dialog: What did you call me for?

name: 주인공
dialog: Huh? You were taking care of the tree. Do you want me to help?

name: Suho
dialog: No, it's okay. I called you because I want to give you this tree.

name: Suho
dialog: This tree is called the “gratitude tree,” and it's a very special tree for the residents of our island.

name: 주인공
dialog: What's a gratitude tree?

name: Suho
dialog: It's a mysterious tree that bears gratitude fruits when you send your gratitude to the tree,

name: Suho
dialog: and it contains the gratitude of the residents of our Hope island.

name: Suho
dialog: This tree is my gratitude tree.

name: 주인공
dialog: It's really amazing.

name: 주인공
dialog: Wow, there are so many gratitude fruits hanging from the tree.

name: Suho
dialog: Do you want to send your gratitude to the tree?
비고: 일러스트<이런 열매 모양의 화면에 감사한 것 1가지를 적을 수 있도록 함>

name: Suho
dialog: <Quest event>
비고: 일러스트<이런 열매 모양의 화면에 감사한 것 1가지를 적을 수 있도록 함>

name: Suho
dialog: Wow, you express gratitude so well.

name: Suho
dialog: Interestingly, expressing gratitude creates more things to be grateful for.

name: Suho
dialog: So start practicing gratitude for the little things.

name: 주인공
dialog: Okay, I promise. Thank you.

name: Suho
dialog: Thank you for making a promise!

name: Suho
dialog: I'll make a gratitude tree for P_name soon, take good care of it.

name: end
dialog: end
